sentences.sContent: The discovery of penicillin was a landmark in the history of medicine.
sentences.sCn: 青霉素的发现是医药史上的里程碑。

synos.tran: [航]陆标，地标；[建]里程碑；[地理][测]地界标；划时代的事

remMethod.val: land(陆地) + mark(标志) → 路标

trans.tranOther: one of the most important events, changes, or discoveries that influences someone or something
